title: Do you get the Gangplank skin
body: If you play him in a bot game?

replies.body:
Co-op vs Ai is fine. 

Custom games  will not give you the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Q7iEWr6A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-07T03:18:00.315+0000)
>
> Co-op vs Ai is fine. 
> 
> Custom games  will not give you the skin.

Thank you so much!

> [{quoted}](name=finkypop,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Q7iEWr6A,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-07T03:34:44.817+0000)
>
> Thank you so much!

No problem. :)
